what.lead: Enable Europeans to participate in policy-making,
what.text: by creating digital platforms and citizen assemblies. This will give people the possibility to give feedback on legislative proposals, take part in political decisions and shape their societies.

what.lead: Give Europeans a say in how the budget of the EU is allocated,
what.text: by implementing participatory budgeting. EU citizens will be able to decide how a specific portion of EU funds is spent.
